Frequently Asked Questions

Beatrice answers from the tub
Why are all the clothes wet?
They are not wet. They are damp. There is a critical distinction. Wetness implies a temporary condition. Our garments exist in a permanent state of atmospheric saturation, which is essential for maintaining their connection to the spectral plane. Also, I design them in a bathtub, so.
Has Beatrice really not left the bathtub since 1987?
I got out briefly in 1994 to vote in the Belgian municipal elections. The pigeons were displeased. A collection was lost. I will not make that mistake again. The water is changed every Thursday by Jacques-Henri, who died in 1934 and therefore does not mind the task.
Are the pigeons actually making design decisions?
The Council of Seven has final approval on all hemlines, colour palettes, and fabric selections. Their process is opaque. They coo. Sometimes the coo means yes, sometimes it means no. Gerald (Director of Hemlines) has not cooed in four months and we are beginning to worry. The Spring collection hangs in the balance.
Can I return an item?
Returns are processed by Vladimir Petrov (d. 2003), whose unfinished business is a very specific grudge against FedEx. He will accept your return but he will not be happy about it. Allow 6-8 weeks, or 6-8 centuries, whichever comes first. Items must be returned in their original dampness.
My Eau de Spectre triggered an actual s√©ance. Is this covered by warranty?
Per our terms: Bathing Bewte is not liable for any supernatural events, including but not limited to: spontaneous s√©ances, poltergeist activity, temporal displacement, conversations with the deceased, conversations with the deceased about the deceased's opinions on your outfit, or the lingering scent of elderflower in rooms where no elderflower exists. The perfume is working as intended.
What is your relationship with Threadbare Corpse?
We do not acknowledge them. Their founder, a ghoul named Derek, was briefly employed as an ectoplasm technician before being fired for "insufficient dampness commitment." He now produces mass-market shrouds that contain no supernatural properties whatsoever. His garments arrive dry. I rest my case.

Contact

Whisper into any body of standing water and we will receive your message within 3-5 business days.

For urgent enquiries, apply Eau de Spectre to the back of your neck and think very hard about hemlines.

Do not email. We do not have electricity. This website is maintained by a ghost who died near a server farm.
